## FieldMergeBarcode.CaseCodeStyle property

Gets or sets the style of a Case Code for barcode type ITF14. The valid values are [STD&#x7C;EXT&#x7C;ADD]

```csharp
public string CaseCodeStyle { get; set; }
```
